bug.author: sherifshehata
bug.summary: Disabling "Minimum box size" in object detection datasets
bug.description: When creating an "object detection dataset", the field "Minimum box size (in pixels) for validation set" doesn't allow the value 0. Although the tool-tip indicates that 0 is used to disable the threshold.

comments.comment: Thanks for the feedback. I have a candidate fix on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/pull/1031>#1031</denchmark-link> - if you wish to help test the fix that would be much appreciated.
Thank you for your fix. I tried it and it works.
